Let not souls be drawn into Battle Creek. Warnings are to be given. A message similar to that borne by John the Baptist is to be heard. But beware of men; for they will seek to divert the mind from the necessity of heeding the true issues for this time. Carry 


                                                                  67. 

on the work now for those who need the truth and who have not resisted the evidences of the truth for fallacies and scientific imaginations.
